name: MetalMania v0.2
description:
V0.4 FINAL BUILD LINK

A robotic combat game inspired by the TV shows Robot Wars, Battlebots and Robotica. Currently in development! Version 0.2.

Features:

2 Single Player Game Modes

7 Playable Bots from the TV show

With more on the way!

DISCLAIMER: I do not own nor am I associated with Robot Wars, Battlebots or Robotica in anyway. This is a fan made project that features some content that I do not own.
